Taxonomy.Topic Description: Assistance with placing orders, selecting items, customization, and providing information on deals.
Inquiries about the status of orders, tracking delivery progress, estimated delivery time updates, and address confirmation.
Clarification on ingredients used, dietary restrictions, suggestions for vegetarian or vegan options, and nutritional information.
Handling late deliveries, missing items, incorrect orders, complaints about delivery personnel, and special delivery requests.
Assistance with payment methods, billing discrepancies, refund requests, and applying promo codes or vouchers.
Troubleshooting online ordering platform issues, login/account problems, browser compatibility, and mobile app support.
Dealing with complaints regarding food quality, packaging, presentation, and providing feedback on customer experience.
Handling requests for specific pizza customization, catering inquiries, dietary accommodations, and organizing group orders.
Enrollment in loyalty programs, points balance inquiries, redeeming rewards, and clarifying program terms and conditions.
Providing information on store locations, hours of operation, corporate inquiries, employment opportunities, and promotional events.

Examples.sample_text: Hi there! I'd like to place an order for delivery to 123 Main Street.
Good evening! Can I order a large pepperoni pizza with extra cheese for pickup?
Hello! I'd like to order a vegetarian pizza with no onions, please.
Hi, can I place an order for two medium pizzas, one Hawaiian and one Margherita?
Hey! I'm interested in ordering a combo deal with a pizza, garlic knots, and soda.
Hi, can you assist me in adding a side of buffalo wings to my existing order?
Good morning! I'd like to order a gluten-free pizza with chicken and mushrooms.
Hello, I'm looking to place a delivery order for a family-sized feast including pizza, pasta, and salad.
Hi! Can I customize a half-and-half pizza with different toppings on each side?
Hey there! I'd like to place an order for a party pack including multiple pizzas and sides.
Good afternoon! I'd like to order a specialty pizza with the chef's recommended toppings.
Hello, I'd like to place an order for delivery to my office address. Can you please confirm the nearest branch?
Hi, can I order a dessert pizza along with my regular order?
Good evening! I'm looking to order a pizza for pickup, but I need it ready in 20 minutes. Is that possible?
Hey there! Can I place an order for a half-sized pizza for a solo dinner?
Hello! I'd like to order a cheeseless pizza with extra veggies, please.
Hi, I'm interested in ordering a deep-dish pizza with extra sauce. Can you accommodate that?
Good morning! I'd like to place an order for a pizza party package for my child's birthday.
Hello, can I add a note to my order requesting no olives on the pizza?
Hi, I'm ready to place an order for pickup. Can you recommend your specialty pizza?
Hi, I placed an order about 30 minutes ago. Can you please provide an update on its status?
Hello, I'm trying to track my order but the tracking link isn't working. Can you assist?
Hey there! My order was scheduled for delivery an hour ago, but I haven't received it yet. What's the status?
Hi, I need to change the delivery address for my order. Can you update it in your system?
Hello, I received a notification that my order was delivered, but I haven't received it. Can you check the delivery status?
Hi, I'm tracking my order and it shows it's out for delivery. Can you provide an estimated arrival time?
Hello, I accidentally closed the order tracking page. Can you resend the tracking link?
Hi, I need to cancel my order, but I can't track it. Can you confirm its status and cancel it for me?
Hello, I placed an order but forgot to note any special delivery instructions. Can I add them now?
Hi, my order was supposed to be delivered by now, but I haven't received any updates. Can you check on it?
Hello, my tracking link is showing an error message. Can you troubleshoot the issue?
Hi, I just received a notification that my order is delayed. Can you provide more information?
Hello, I'm trying to track my order, but it's saying no information is available. Can you help?
Hi, my order was marked as delivered, but I haven't received it yet. Can you investigate?
Hello, my order status hasn't been updated for a while. Can you provide an update?
Hi, I accidentally closed the order confirmation page before noting the order number. Can you help me track it?
Hello, my order was supposed to arrive 30 minutes ago, but it hasn't. Can you check its status?
Hi, I'm trying to track my order, but the website is showing an error. Can you assist?
Hello, I received a message that my order is delayed due to weather conditions. Can you confirm?
Hi, I'm tracking my order, but it seems stuck at a certain location. Can you provide more information?
Hi, I'm curious about the ingredients used in your BBQ Chicken Pizza. Can you provide details?
Hello, I have a nut allergy. Can you tell me which pizzas are safe for me to order?
Hey there! Do you have any gluten-free crust options available?
Hi, can you recommend some vegetarian pizza options?
Hello, I'm interested in the nutritional information for your Margherita Pizza. Where can I find it?
Hi, do you offer any vegan cheese substitutes for your pizzas?
Hello, I'm looking to order a pizza for my son's birthday party. Do you have any kid-friendly options?
Hi, are there any spicy pizza options on your menu?
Hello, I'm interested in trying a specialty pizza. Can you provide some recommendations?
Hi, I'm planning a party and would like to order some appetizers along with the pizzas. What do you recommend?
Hello, I have a dairy intolerance. Can you tell me which pizzas I should avoid?
Hi, do you offer any low-carb options for your pizzas?
Hello, are your pizza crusts made with whole wheat flour?
Hi, I'm interested in the ingredients used in your Alfredo sauce. Can you provide more information?
Hello, I have a shellfish allergy. Are there any pizzas that may contain shellfish or traces of it?
Hi, do you offer any specialty crust options like cauliflower crust?
Hello, I'm looking for a pizza with a good balance of protein and carbs. Can you recommend one?
Hi, I'm interested in the vegetarian options for your salads. Can you provide details?
Hello, do you offer any specialty toppings that are unique to your pizzeria?
Hi, are your pizzas made with organic ingredients?
Hi, my order was supposed to arrive 30 minutes ago, but it hasn't. Can you check its status?
Hello, I received my order, but one of the pizzas is missing. Can you please assist?
Hey there! I received the wrong order. Can you help me get the correct one?
Hi, I ordered a large pizza, but it arrived cold. Can you send a replacement?
Hello, the delivery driver left my order at the wrong address. What should I do?
Hi, I requested contactless delivery, but the driver insisted on handing me the food directly. Can you address this?
Hello, my order was delivered late, and I missed my lunch break waiting for it. Can you compensate for the inconvenience?
Hi, I received my order, but the garlic knots are burnt. Can you replace them?
Hello, my order was damaged during delivery, and some items are squished. Can you send a replacement?
Hi, I ordered extra sauce with my pizza, but it wasn't included in the delivery. Can you fix this?
Hello, the delivery driver was rude and refused to follow my instructions for contactless delivery. Can you address this behavior?
Hi, I received my order, but the pizza was cold and soggy. Can you send a fresh one?
Hello, I ordered extra cheese on my pizza, but it seems like there's hardly any. Can you rectify this?
Hi, my order was delivered to the wrong address entirely. Can you ensure this doesn't happen again?
Hello, I received my order, but the pizza box was torn and leaking grease. Can you replace it?
Hi, the delivery driver forgot to include my drink with the order. Can you arrange to send it separately?
Hello, my order was delivered much later than the estimated time. Can you provide an explanation?
Hi, I received my order, but the pizza toppings are not what I requested. Can you fix this?
Hello, I ordered a salad, but it was missing the dressing. Can you send it separately?

Hi, I'm trying to use my gift card to pay for my order, but it's not working. Can you assist?

Hi, my payment went through, but I didn't receive an order confirmation. Can you verify if my order was placed?

Hi, I accidentally placed an order and need to cancel it before it's processed. Can you assist?

Hi, I'd like to split the payment for my order between two credit cards. Is that possible?
Hello, I received a notification that my payment failed, but I'm not sure why. Can you provide more information?

Hello, the website is displaying an error message when I try to select my delivery address. Can you assist?

Hello, I'm unable to update my account information. Can you help me resolve this?
Hi, I keep getting logged out of my account automatically. Can you fix this issue?
Hello, I'm trying to apply a promo code, but the website is not accepting it. Can you assist with this?
Hi, the images of menu items are not loading on the website. Can you check what's causing the problem?
Hello, the 'forgot password' link on the login page is not working. Can you provide another way to reset my password?

Hello, I'm encountering an error message when I try to update my payment method. Can you assist with this issue?

Hi, I'm trying to change my delivery address, but the system is not saving the changes. Can you assist with this issue?

Hi, I'm having difficulty finding the customer support contact information on the website. Can you provide it to me?
Hello, the mobile app is not showing my saved addresses. Can you troubleshoot this issue?
Hi, the website is displaying an error message when I try to access the 'help' section. Can you provide assistance?
Hi, I ordered a pizza and it arrived burnt. Can you ensure better quality next time?
